intro: Psychotria japurensis, commonly known as the Japuré Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Amazon rainforests of South America, particularly in Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of tropical forests. Due to its habitat and limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
